original_text: Now then, please swear to me by the Lord that, as I have dealt kindly with you, you also will deal kindly with my father's house, and give me a sure sign
korean_text: 그러므로 이제 청하노니 내가 너희를 선대하였은즉 너희도 내 아버지의 집을 선대하도록 여호와의 이름으로 내게 맹세하고 내게 증표를 내라

sentences.original_text: please swear to me by the Lord
as I have dealt kindly with you
you also will deal kindly with my father's house
sentences.korean_translation: 너희도 내 아버지 집을 친절히 대할 것이라

sentences.original_text: and give me a sure sign
